Common problem:
1.q: What is the map editor?
a: The map editor is a tool provided by CrystalLink - Infinity that can quickly edit the map of map mode and save it as a new map.

2.q: How to open the map editor?
a: The map editor needs to switch the level mode to the map mode. When the self-built map option is off, You need to complete the universal map level to open the map editor. A sub-level corresponds to a map editor option. When the self-built map option is on, the map editor option is automatically enabled and you can create your own map.
